mapper.select: select PSN_NO as psnNo,PSN_NAME as psnName,CERTNO as certno,GEND as gend,PSN_CERT_TYPE as psnCertType,BRDY as brdy,SURV_STAS as survStas from psn_info_b where (PSN_NO like CONCAT(concat('%',#{queryCondition},'%'))) or (PSN_NAME like CONCAT(concat('%',#{queryCondition},'%'))) or (CERTNO like CONCAT(concat('%',#{queryCondition},'%')))
select PSN_INSU_STAS as psnInsuStas,PSN_NO as psnNo,PAUS_INSU_DATE as pausInsuDate,PSN_INSU_DATE as psnInsuDate,INSUTYPE as insutype from psn_insu_d where PSN_NO = #{psnNo}

select EMP_NO as empNo, EMP_ENTT_CODG as empEnttCodg, EMP_MGT_TYPE as empMgtType, PRNT_EMP_NO as prntEmpNo, ASOC_LEGENT_FLAG as asocLegentFlag, EMP_TYPE as empType, EMP_NAME as empName, REG_NAME as regName, LOC_ADMDVS as locAdmdvs, CONER_NAME as conerName, CONER_EMAIL as conerEmail, TEL as tel, FAX_NO as faxNo, TAX_NO as taxNo, ORGCODE as orgcode, REGNO as regno, REGNO_CERT_TYPE as regnoCertType, EMP_ADDR as empAddr, POSCODE as poscode, APRV_ESTA_DEPT as aprvEstaDept, APRV_ESTA_DATE as aprvEstaDate, APRV_ESTA_DOCNO as aprvEstaDocno, PRNT_ADMDVS as prntAdmdvs, INSU_OPTINS as insuOptins, ORG_VALI_STAS as orgValiStas, LEGREP_TEL as legrepTel, LEGREP_NAME as legrepName, LEGREP_CERT_TYPE as legrepCertType, LEGREP_CERTNO as legrepCertno, ORGCODE_ISSU_EMP as orgcodeIssuEmp, VALI_FLAG as valiFlag, RID as rid, CRTE_TIME as crteTime, UPDT_TIME as updtTime, CRTER as crter, CRTER_NAME as crterName, CRTE_OPTINS as crteOptins, OPTER as opter, OPTER_NAME as opterName, OPT_TIME as optTime, OPTINS as optins, POOLAREA as poolarea, VER as ver from insu_emp_info_b where (EMP_NO like CONCAT(concat('%',#{queryCondition},'%')) or EMP_NAME like CONCAT(concat('%',#{queryCondition},'%')) )

select pid.EMP_NO as empNo,ieib.EMP_NAME as empName,pid.PSN_NO as psnNo,pib.PSN_NAME as psnName,pid.INSUTYPE as insutype,pid.PSN_TYPE as psnType,pid.PSN_INSU_STAS as psnInsuStas,pid.CRT_INSU_DATE as crtInsuDate from psn_insu_d as pid,insu_emp_info_b as ieib,psn_info_b as pib where pid.EMP_NO = #{empNo} and pid.PSN_NO = #{psnNo} and pid.EMP_NO =ieib.EMP_NO and pid.PSN_NO = pib.PSN_NO

select PSN_TRAT_CLCT_ID as psnTratClctId, PSN_NO as psnNo, INSUTYPE as insutype, TRAT_CLCT_TYPE as tratClctType, BEGN_YM as begnYm, END_YM as endYm, TRAT_CLCT_MONS as tratClctMons, VALI_FLAG as valiFlag, MEMO as memo, INSU_ORG as insuOrg, OPT_CHNL as optChnl, OPTINS as optins, OPTER as opter, OPTER_NAME as opterName, OPT_TIME as optTime, CRTE_OPTINS as crteOptins, CRTER as crter, CRTER_NAME as crterName, CRTE_TIME as crteTime, UPDT_TIME as updtTime, RID as rid, PSN_INSU_RLTS_ID as psnInsuRltsId, PSN_INSU_MGT_EID as psnInsuMgtEid from psn_trat_year_d where PSN_NO = #{psnNo} and VALI_FLAG = '1'
